thread.title: Ackman ends a six-year crusade against Herbalife

title: Ackman ends a six-year crusade against Herbalife
text:
Ackman ends a six-year crusade against Herbalife 12:07am GMT - 01:20 
One of Wall Street's most bitter investment battles comes to an end, as billionaire investor William Ackman ends his bet against nutrition company Herbalife. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
One of Wall Street's most bitter investment battles comes to an end, as billionaire investor William Ackman ends his bet against nutrition company Herbalife. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2GT3n5w
